body_html:
Adding following line in bashrc worked for me
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$CUDA_HOME/lib64:/usr/lib/nvidia-375:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
Details :
ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS , GPU : NVIDIA GTX 1050Ti
downloaded .deb file & followed dpkg method for cuda toolkit 8.0 installation
Cuda compilation tools, release 8.0, V8.0.61
tensorflow-gpu 1.3.0 (via pip)

body:
Adding following line in bashrc worked for me 
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$CUDA_HOME/lib64:/usr/lib/nvidia-375:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
Details : 
ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS , GPU : NVIDIA GTX 1050Ti 
downloaded .deb file & followed dpkg method for cuda toolkit 8.0 installation 
Cuda compilation tools, release 8.0, V8.0.61
tensorflow-gpu 1.3.0 (via pip)
